original_title: DQNなバイト先の先輩に妹を犯●れてしまった俺。さらに悪いことに、犯●れている妹に興奮してしまった俺 佐倉あゆ
overview: My older brother's part-time job, DQN, came to my house and my big-breasted little sister (Ayu) was raped. Her unreliable brother can't complain even if her sister touches him. On the contrary, a bastard who gets excited by his younger sister being raped. Ayu, who had her girlfriend's incest filmed, was fucked by DQN in front of her brother's eyes and was raped inside out.
title: The DQN Bad Boy From Work Raped My Little Sister And To Make Matters Even Worse, I Got Turned On Watching My Little Sister Get Fucked Ayu Sakura
